translations: 公正无私；漠不关心；不感兴趣

sentences.sentence: The real name of devotion is disinterestedness.
His chief equipment seems to be disinterestedness.
sentences.translation: 他主要的本事似乎是超然不群。

sentences.sentence: The rule may be summed up in one word-disinterestedness.
sentences.translation: 这种原则可以概括为一个词——客观。
